mapper.sql: id, order_no, amount, out_amount, out_rebate_amount, return_amount, deduction_amount, receive_amount, remaining_amount, company_no, company_name, customer_no, customer_name, create_time, update_time, status, return_out_amount, order_date, frozen_order_amount, unfreeze_order_amount, wholesale_order_type
mapper.select:
SELECT c.* FROM ( SELECT id, customer_no, customer_name, order_no, order_date FROM customer_order_remain WHERE 1=1
ORDER BY order_date DESC ) c GROUP BY c.customer_no ORDER BY c.order_date DESC

SELECT cor.id, cor.order_no, cor.amount, cor.out_amount, cor.out_rebate_amount, cor.return_amount, cor.deduction_amount, cor.receive_amount, cor.remaining_amount, cor.company_no, cor.company_name, cor.customer_no, cor.customer_name, cor.create_time, cor.update_time, cor.status, cor.wholesale_order_type, cor.return_out_amount, cor.order_date, cor.frozen_order_amount, cor.unfreeze_order_amount, cor.remaining_amount+cor.frozen_order_amount as order_remaining_book_amount, WRT.term_no, WRT.name term_name, BP.paid_amount, IFNULL(CRR.margin_amount, 0) margin_amount, IFNULL(CRR.margin_remainder_amount, 0) margin_remainder_amount, DTL0.advance_scale, case when DTL0.advance_scale>0 then DTL0.advance_scale * amount / 100 else null end pre_order_amount FROM (SELECT
FROM customer_order_remain WHERE 1=1
LIMIT #{page.startRowNum} ,#{page.pageSize}) cor left join ( SELECT saler_no,buyer_no, bill_no,biz_type FROM bill_sale_balance GROUP BY bill_no )bsb ON bsb.saler_no = cor.company_no AND bsb.buyer_no = cor.customer_no and bsb.bill_no = cor.order_no LEFT JOIN customer_rece_rel CRR ON CRR.company_no = cor.company_no AND CRR.customer_no = cor.customer_no AND CRR.status = 1 AND CRR.margin_control_flag = '1' LEFT JOIN (SELECT bill_pre_payment_nt.sale_order_no, SUM( bill_pre_payment_nt.paid_amount ) paid_amount FROM bill_pre_payment_nt WHERE bill_pre_payment_nt.audit_status = 1 GROUP BY bill_pre_payment_nt.sale_order_no) BP ON BP.sale_order_no = cor.order_no LEFT JOIN wholesale_rece_term WRT ON CRR.term_no = WRT.term_no AND WRT.status = 1 LEFT JOIN wholesale_rece_term_dtl DTL0 ON WRT.term_no = DTL0.term_no AND DTL0.control_point = cor.wholesale_order_type order by cor.update_time desc
SELECT COUNT(1) as s FROM customer_order_remain WHERE 1=1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO customer_order_remain (id, order_no, amount, out_amount, out_rebate_amount, return_amount, deduction_amount, receive_amount, remaining_amount, company_no, company_name, customer_no, customer_name, create_time, update_time, status, return_out_amount, order_date, frozen_order_amount, unfreeze_order_amount, wholesale_order_type) VALUES (#{id,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{orderNo,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{outAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{outRebateAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{returnAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{deductionAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{receiveAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{remainingAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{companyNo,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{companyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{customerNo,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{customerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{returnOutAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{orderDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{frozenOrderAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{unfreezeOrderAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{wholesaleOrderType,jdbcType=TINYINT})

mapper.update:
UPDATE customer_order_remain
order_no = #{orderNo,jdbcType=CHAR},
amount = #{amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
out_amount = #{outAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
out_rebate_amount = #{outRebateAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
return_amount = #{returnAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
deduction_amount = #{deductionAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
receive_amount = #{receiveAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
remaining_amount = #{remainingAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
company_no = #{companyNo,jdbcType=CHAR},
company_name = #{companyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
customer_no = #{customerNo,jdbcType=CHAR},
customer_name = #{customerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT},
return_out_amount = #{returnOutAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
order_date = #{orderDate,jdbcType=DATE},
frozen_order_amount = #{frozenOrderAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
unfreeze_order_amount = #{unfreezeOrderAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
wholesale_order_type = #{wholesaleOrderType,jdbcType=TINYINT},
WHERE id = #{id,jdbcType=CHAR}

UPDATE customer_order_remain SET order_no = #{orderNo,jdbcType=CHAR}, amount = #{amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, out_amount = #{outAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, out_rebate_amount = #{outRebateAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, return_amount = #{returnAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, deduction_amount = #{deductionAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, receive_amount = #{receiveAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, remaining_amount = #{remainingAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, company_no = #{companyNo,jdbcType=CHAR}, company_name = #{companyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, customer_no = #{customerNo,jdbcType=CHAR}, customer_name = #{customerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, return_out_amount = #{returnOutAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, order_date = #{orderDate,jdbcType=DATE}, frozen_order_amount = #{frozenOrderAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, unfreeze_order_amount = #{unfreezeOrderAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, wholesale_order_type = #{wholesaleOrderType,jdbcType=TINYINT} WHERE id = #{id,jdbcType=CHAR}
